FuncDef: This command specifies the forwarding scope used for IPv6 multicast traffic when PIM snooping for IPv6 is enabled.

ParaDef.Info: Enables forwarding for PIM-snooped IPv6 multicast traffic based on the low-order 32 bits of its destination IPv6 address.
Enables forwarding for PIM-snooped IPv6 multicast traffic based on its full source (if specified in the join) and destination IPv6 address.
